channel.title: 110 Office Hours :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: How to Get Help in this Course CC 110 can be an interesting course due to the large amount of material covered and much of the material is brand new to students. Therefore, you are encouraged to seek help whenever you feel you are being overwhelmed or donâ€™t understand a topic. You are not alone! Most students in CC 110 have never studied anything relating to computer science before, so it is new to everyone.
